Updated November     pm



Yesterday Charles Brown professor of philosophy was announced as the  Roe R PERIOD Cross Distinguished Professor PERIOD President Michael Shonrock David Cordle provost Marie Miller dean of Liberal Arts and Sciences and Ellen Hansen chair of Social Sciences surprised Brown and his students in his  a.m PERIOD Introduction to Philosophy class to make the announcement PERIOD The award includes a  honorarium for professional activities PERIOD
